Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the internal functions used by the driver.

Function Documentation

static void HWA_allParamDoneISR ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Function to handle completion ISR after all paramset are executed.

Precondition
HWA_open() has been called
Parameters
argInternal HWA driver object
Returns
none
See also
HWA_enableDoneInterrupt()
static void HWA_deleteInstance ( HWA_Driver *  ptrHWADriver)
static

Function to de-initialize HWA specified by the passed driver object. No driver functions should be invoked after this call.

Precondition
HWA_open() has been called
Parameters
ptrHWADriverInternal HWA driver object
Returns
none
See also
HWA_close()
static void HWA_doReset ( DSSHWACCRegs *  ctrlBaseAddr)
inlinestatic

Function to perform the hardware reset of HWA peripheral.

Parameters
ctrlBaseAddrHWA peripheral's control base address
Returns
none
See also
HWA_close(), HWA_open(), HWA_reset()
static int32_t HWA_getDriverAccess ( HWA_Driver *  ptrHWADriver,
bool  checkConfigProgress,
bool  checkParamProgress,
uint32_t  paramsetIdx 
)
static

Function to validate the state of the driver and gain access.

Parameters
ptrHWADriverInternal HWA driver object that will be checked for sanity
checkConfigProgressflag to indicate whether to check driver's configInProgress bit
checkParamProgressflag to indicate whether to check driver's paramSetMapInProgress bitmap
paramsetIdxshould be valid if checkParamProgress is set to true.
Returns
0 if driver access is allowed; error code if access is denied.
static void HWA_paramDoneISR ( uintptr_t  arg)
static

Function to handle each paramset completion ISR.

Precondition
HWA_open() has been called
Parameters
argInternal HWA driver object
Returns
none
See also
HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt()
static void HWA_releaseDriverAccess ( HWA_Driver *  ptrHWADriver,
bool  configProgress,
bool  paramProgress,
uint32_t  paramsetIdx 
)
static

Function to release access to the driver.

Parameters
ptrHWADriverInternal HWA driver object that will be checked for sanity
configProgressflag to indicate whether to release driver's configInProgress bit
paramProgressflag to indicate whether to release driver's paramSetMapInProgress bitmap
paramsetIdxshould be valid if paramProgress is set to true.
Returns
none
static int32_t HWA_validateParamSetConfig ( HWA_Driver *  ptrHWADriver,
HWA_ParamConfig *  paramConfig 
)
static

Function to validate the user passed paramConfig. This function gets compiled out if HWA_PARAM_CHECK is disabled.

Parameters
ptrHWADriverInternal HWA driver object that will be checked for sanity
paramConfiguser supplied paramSet Config
Returns
0 if valid paramSet config if provided else a valid error code.
